summary.span: 顯示影像，並回應在影像上按一下滑鼠按鍵的控制項。

span.span: A control that displays an image and responds to mouse clicks on the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [判斷使用者所按的位置Determining Where the User Clicked](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked) - [ImageButton 控制項和驗證ImageButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來顯示影像回應滑鼠點按動作。Use the control to display an image that responds to mouse clicks. 同時和引發事件時按一下控制項時。Both the and events are raised when the control is clicked. 您可以使用事件處理常式進行控制項行為與命令按鈕一樣。You can use the event handler to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名稱可以是使用與控制項相關聯屬性。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 這可讓多個放置在相同網頁上的控制項。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 值屬性然後以程式設計方式識別事件處理常式，以決定適當的動作執行時每個按一下控制項時。The value of the property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 屬性也可用來將傳遞命令，例如指定遞增順序的其他資訊。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. 使用控制，類似於使用 ASP.NET控制項。Using the control is similar to using the ASP.NET control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[按鈕 Web 伺服器控制項內容地圖](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf)。For more information, see [Button Web Server Controls Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf). 類別概觀和控制項。and the class overview for the control. ## 判斷使用者所按的位置Determining Where the User Clicked 使用事件處理常式，您可以透過程式設計方式判斷的座標映像所按的位置。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 然後，您可以撰寫回應時，根據座標的值。You can then code a response, based on the values of the coordinates. 請注意，（0，0） 的原點位於影像的左上角。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. ## ImageButton 控制項和驗證ImageButton Controls and Validation 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要避免發生頁面驗證，將屬性`false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874). 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立顯示按一下映像時的座標的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that displays the coordinates at which an image is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂類別時，方法使用主要由控制項開發人員控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓文字一律會顯示為細的框線。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the text always appears with a thin border. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。The first part of this code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 第二個部分必須儲存為程式碼檔案 (C# 的.cs) 或 Visual Basic 的.vb。The second part must be saved as a code file (either .cs for C# or .vb for Visual Basic). 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 您可以指定，或決定是否要在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 這個屬性通常會設定為`false`重設或 [清除] 按鈕，以防止在按下按鈕時執行驗證。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 時的值屬性設定為`true`，您也可以使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的驗證。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用以防止發生頁面驗證的屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 請注意如何方法獨立啟動每個驗證控制項。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 就會引發事件的形式在控制項階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. > [!NOTE] > 這個事件會造成頁面回傳至伺服器。This event causes the page to post back to the server. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件來判斷哪一個按一下控制項時。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定要執行時的命令按一下控制項時，例如`Sort`， `Cancel`，或`Edit`。Use this property to specify the command to perform when the control is clicked, such as `Sort`, `Cancel`, or `Edit`. 這可讓多個放置在相同網頁上的控制項。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 這個屬性中的值再以程式設計方式識別事件處理常式，以決定適當的動作執行時每個按一下控制項時。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 補充資訊的命令，例如指定遞增的排序次序中，可以使用包含屬性。Supplemental information about the command, such as specifying ascending sort order, can be included by using the property. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用相關聯的命令名稱屬性控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a command name with an control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否按一下就可執行回傳至伺服器。Use the property to specify whether an can be clicked to perform a post back to the server. 如果您將此屬性設定為`false`，該控制項呈現在頁面上，但不會引發的回傳事件時按下。If you set this property to `false`, the control renders on the page, but does not raise a post back event when clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此頁面包含兩個控制項。The page contains two controls. 屬性設定為`true`如`EnabledImageButton`影像按鈕，導致回傳至伺服器時按下。The property is set to `true` for the `EnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to post back to the server when clicked. 屬性設定為`false`如`NotEnabledImageButton`影像按鈕，使其呈現在頁面上，但不是會回傳至伺服器時按下。The property is set to `false` for the `NotEnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to render on the page, but not post back to the server when clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制呈現屬性使用`alt`屬性。By default, the control renders the property using an `alt` attribute. 當未設定屬性，控制項不包含`alt`屬性來指定替代文字控制項的呈現。When the property is not set, the control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate-text in the control rendering. XHTML 文件類型定義需要`alt`影像控制項上的屬性。The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls. 不過，協助工具最佳作法建議並不會傳遞網頁的內容相關的資訊的影像控制項不應該指定`alt`屬性。However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute. 您可以藉由設定符合 XHTML 和協助工具需求屬性`true`。You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the property to `true`. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件，代表控制項的回傳行為。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 物件通常隨後會傳遞至方法，用來取得用戶端指令碼函式的參考，叫用時，會導致回傳至網頁伺服器。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to postback to the page. 在擴充主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法類別。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 使用事件處理常式，您可以透過程式設計方式判斷的座標映像所按的位置。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 然後，您可以撰寫回應時，根據這些座標值。You can then code a response, based on the values of these coordinates. 請注意，（0，0） 的原點位於影像的左上角。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以顯示在使用者按一下映像的位置座標。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the coordinates where the user clicks the image. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 事件處理常式用來進行控制項行為與命令按鈕一樣。The event handler is used to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名稱可以是使用與控制項相關聯屬性。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 這可讓多個放置在網頁上的控制項。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the Web page. 這個屬性中的值再以程式設計方式識別事件處理常式，以決定適當的動作執行時每個按一下控制項時。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 屬性也可用來將傳遞命令，例如指定遞增順序的其他資訊。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. > [!NOTE] > 就會引發事件的形式在控制項階層架構透過`BubbleEvent`。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件來判斷哪一個按一下控制項時。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，會使頁面回傳到本身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您執行 post 使用跨網頁控制項。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 設定屬性至網頁的 URL 時張貼按一下控制項時。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定`Page2.aspx`會使得包含的網頁張貼到控制項`Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果您未指定的值屬性頁面回傳至本身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當執行伺服器端驗證使用的控制項與跨網頁回傳時，您應該檢查頁面的屬性是`true`之前處理回傳。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 在跨網頁回傳，若要檢查頁面會是上一頁。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 下列 Visual Basic 程式碼會示範方式：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 如需有關跨網頁公佈技術的詳細資訊，請參閱[跨網頁張貼在 ASP.NET Web Form](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來執行跨網頁回傳。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 當使用者按一下控制項，在網頁回傳至指定的目標頁面的文字方塊中輸入的值屬性。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要執行此範例中，您也必須為這個程式碼範例的相同目錄中建立目標頁面的檔案。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 目標頁面的程式碼提供一個範例中。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取從另一個頁面使用的已張貼值屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此頁面取得公佈前一個分頁的並向使用者顯示的字串。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果您嘗試直接執行這個程式碼範例，您就會發生錯誤，因為值`Text`欄位就是`null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `Text` field will be `null`. 請改用此程式碼建立目標網頁，並將檔案放在與前一個範例的程式碼相同的目錄。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 檔案的名稱必須對應到指定的值前一個範例中的屬性。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 當您執行先前的範例程式碼時，此頁面將會自動執行跨網頁回傳發生時。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要由控制項開發人員使用屬性衍生的自訂類別時控制項。The property is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 使用屬性來判斷與相關聯的值控制項。Use the property to determine the value associated with an control. 這個屬性會覆寫基底實作以永遠傳回`HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`。This property overrides the base implementation to always return `HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫中自訂方法控制，好讓它永遠會傳回輸入標記。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control so that it always returns an Input tag. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 程式碼範例的第一個部分必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。The first part of the code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 第二個部分必須在.cs 檔案 （適用於 C#) 或.vb 檔案 （適用於 Visual Basic)。The second part must be in a .cs file (for C#) or a .vb file (for Visual Basic). 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以獨立於其他的驗證群組頁面上進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值和屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要驗證時的控制項控制項回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 此頁面包含從使用者擷取資料的三個文字方塊和三個控制項，以確保該使用者不會讓文字方塊空白。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制項中的前兩個文字方塊`PersonalInfoGroup`驗證群組和控制項中的第三個文字方塊是`LocationInfoGroup`驗證群組。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 當`ImageButton1`按一下時，驗證群組中的控制項`PersonalInfoGroup`會進行驗證。When `ImageButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 當`ImageButton2`按一下時，驗證群組中的控制項`LocationInfoGroup`會進行驗證。When `ImageButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated.
